rtega_mnemonic:
絨絨RS
绒绒		毧狨羢茸silk, cotton, or woolen fabric
  • fabric made from thread 糸 for the standard of the warrior 戎
  • plant 艹 in the form of an ear 耳

Pictophonetic: 戎 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
絨毛 [ róng máo ]: fur; down (soft fur); villi capillary (in the small intestine)
絨線 [ róng xiàn ]: wool; woolen thread

    • 戎 [ róng ] arms, armaments; military affairs
heisig_chinese_memo: When the old lady returned from visiting the fiesta, she found a burglar in her home tied down with carpet yarn. A note said: Regards from your friendly neighborhood Spiderman. Well, she was not amused when she saw the remains of her carpet.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you use ten spears (戎) to turn the thread (糸) into wool cloth
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The old lady looks down on spiderman when he has needle (drug) parties across the street.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Shito " to " Rong " sound. " Fleece " means fine cloth. "Jade articles. Department": "Fleece, fine cloth." Such as the Yuan Dynasty Sun Zhouqing "Dianqianhuan. Chu Yun>: "The green window spends time at the window velvet, who will share my heart with in the spring."

" Velvet " said birds and animals pubescent body, such as the "duck", "goose." Also refers to woolen fabrics or textiles with wool on them. For example, Yuanhuai of Yuan Dynasty "Zhaojun Out of the Fortress": "The down-capped Diaoqiu is the same as the brocade, the cicadas on the temples are cowardly and windy." Song Yingxing of the Ming Dynasty "Heavenly Creations. "Naifu": "Where the sheep is cut, the thick one is felt, and the thin one is velvet."

" Fleece " also means silk thread used in embroidery. For example, Ma Yu in the Jin Dynasty "The golden lotus produces jade flowers": "White velvet is clear, and things follow the needles to embroider my heart." "Water Margin" Chapter 45: "He is a small official in the woolen shop of Pei's family, and he is a monk in Baoen Temple ."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Shito " to " Rong " sound. " Fleece " means fine cloth.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「戎」聲。「絨」表示細布。《玉篇．系部》：「絨，細布也。」如元代孫周卿〈殿前歡．楚雲〉：「綠窗閑數唾窗絨，一春心事和誰共。」

　　「絨」也表示鳥獸身上的柔毛，如「鴨絨」、「鵝絨」。又指毛織物或上面有毛的紡織品。如元代元淮〈昭君出塞〉：「絨帽貂裘同錦綺，翠眉蟬鬢怯風霜。」明代宋應星《天工開物．乃服》：「凡綿羊剪毳，粗者為氈，細者為絨。」

　　「絨」還表示刺綉用的絲綫。如金代馬鈺〈金蓮出玉花〉：「白絨清，物隨針繡我心。」《水滸全傳》第45回：「他是裴家絨線鋪裏小官人，出家在報恩寺中。」

Chu Yun>: "The green window spends time at the window velvet, who will share my heart with in the spring." " Velvet" said birds and animals pubescent body, such as the "duck", "goose." Also refers to woolen fabrics or textiles with wool on them. 絨字的基本解释

絨
róng
见“绒”。

絨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［róng］
［《廣韻》如融切，平東，日。］
亦作“1”。“绒1”的繁体字。
(1)鸟兽身上的柔毛。
(2)织物名。古代指细布。今指表面有一层绒毛的纺织品。
(3)毛织物。
(4)一种松散可以分擘的丝缕。供刺绣用。

絨字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絨； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页923第09
【廣韻】如融切【集韻】而融切【正韻】而中切，?音戎。【玉篇】細布也。【廣韻】同狨。

絨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
絨字的起名意思

暂无。

velvet

velvet
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［róng］
["Guangyun" such as fusion, Pingdong, Japan. ]
Also called "1". The traditional characters of "毛1".
(1) The feathers on birds and beasts.
(2) Fabric name. Ancient refers to fine cloth. Today refers to textiles with a layer of fluff on the surface.
(3) Wool fabric.
(4) A loose thread that can be divided. For embroidery.
velvet
